SELECT b.BOARD_ID, b.TITLE, b.SUMMARY, b.CREATED_AT, b.VISIBLE, u.USER_ID AS userSeq, CASE WHEN b.VISIBLE = '0' THEN 'anonymous' ELSE u.BOJ_ID END AS bojId, CASE WHEN b.VISIBLE = '0' THEN '익명' ELSE u.NAME END AS userName, IFNULL(u.BAEKJOON, 'Unrated') AS userTier, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LIKES l WHERE l.BOARD_ID = b.BOARD_ID) AS likeCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMMENT c WHERE c.BOARD_ID = b.BOARD_ID AND c.VISIBLE = '1') AS commentCount,
(SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 FROM LIKES l WHERE l.BOARD_ID = b.BOARD_ID AND l.USER_ID = #{currentUserSeq}) AS isLiked, (SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 FROM SCRAP s WHERE s.BOARD_ID = b.BOARD_ID AND s.USER_ID = #{currentUserSeq}) AS isScrapped
FALSE AS isLiked, FALSE AS isScrapped
FROM BOARD b JOIN USER u ON b.USER_ID = u.USER_ID WHERE b.VISIBLE IN ('1', '0')
AND (b.TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR b.BODY LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
ORDER BY
likeCount DESC, b.CREATED_AT DESC
commentCount DESC, b.CREATED_AT DESC
b.CREATED_AT DESC
LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

FROM BOARD b JOIN USER u ON b.USER_ID = u.USER_ID WHERE b.BOARD_ID = #{boardId}
